title: Please Help, Looking for Duo Partner
body: I am so sick of playing well and not dying and getting team mates who are in double digit deaths how can i stop this? no one listens when you ping or type in not to push blindly and im just so over it, I just want some one who has the same goals as me which is to climb out of bronze.

replies.body: I'm the same bro. Add me if you like, Juskillmealready.
